name: Spinach "Bread"
ingredients: 10 ounce package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and squeezed well
1 ounce parmesan cheese (1/4 cup, the kind in a can)

instructions.en: Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C). Butter an 8x8 inch glass baking pan.
instructions.sk: Predhrejte rúru na 200°C. Vymastite maslom 20x20 cm sklenenú zapekaciu misu.
instructions.ja: オーブンを400°F（200°C）に予熱します。8x8インチ（約20x20cm）のガラス製ベーキング皿にバターを塗ります。

instructions.en: In a small bowl, mix well the thawed and squeezed spinach, beaten eggs, garlic powder, salt, pepper, and parmesan cheese.
instructions.sk: V malej miske dobre zmiešajte rozmrazený a vyžmýkaný špenát, rozšľahané vajcia, cesnakový prášok, soľ, korenie a parmezán.
instructions.ja: 小さなボウルに解凍してよく絞ったほうれん草、溶き卵、ガーリックパウダー、塩、コショウ、パルメザンチーズを入れてよく混ぜます。

instructions.en: Pour the mixture into the prepared baking pan, spreading it evenly.
instructions.sk: Zmes nalejte do pripravenej zapekacej misy a rovnomerne ju rozotrite.
instructions.ja: 混ぜた材料を準備したベーキング皿に注ぎ、均等に広げます。

instructions.en: Bake for 15-20 minutes at 400°F (200°C) until set and slightly browned.
instructions.sk: Pečte 15-20 minút pri teplote 200°C, kým sa neustáli a mierne nezhnedne.
instructions.ja: 400°F（200°C）で15〜20分間、固まり、少し焼き色がつくまで焼きます。

instructions.en: Cool for a few minutes in the pan.
instructions.sk: Nechajte niekoľko minút vychladnúť v miske.
instructions.ja: 皿に入れたまま数分間冷まします。
食べやすい大きさに切り分けます。

instructions.en: Store in refrigerator or freeze for later use.
instructions.sk: Skladujte v chladničke alebo zmrazte na neskoršie použitie.
instructions.ja: 冷蔵庫で保存するか、後で使用するために冷凍します。

notes: This Spinach "Bread" is a low-carb, high-nutrient alternative to traditional bread. It's rich in vitamins and minerals from the spinach, and protein from the eggs and cheese. This versatile dish can be used as a side, a base for sandwiches, or even as a pizza crust. For best results, make sure to squeeze as much water as possible from the thawed spinach to prevent the 'bread' from becoming too soggy.
